attributes.action: Make election manifestos for legally binding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Election manifestos at present are, at best, unreliable documents in showing the intent of any future government, regardless of political position. By making them legally binding in the manner of enforcing a government into at least attempting to carry through on what is contained within, it would give the public some trust in the MP's that are supposed to be representing them.
